function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of resources for implementing exhaustive measures in low-income developing countries","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and higher positivity rates among employees","Mitigation":"Support for funding and resources, prioritizing cost-effective interventions","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Employees in low-income developing countries","Owner":"Government organizations, NGOs, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Costly workplace closures","Impact":"Disruption of business operations and potential economic strain","Mitigation":"Implementing targeted interventions, support for affected businesses","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Employers, employees, local businesses","Owner":"Employers, government organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty in selecting the most effective PPE","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission among healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Establishing PPE guidelines based on best available evidence, adequate training for healthcare personnel","Technologies":"PPE selection and testing technologies","People":"Healthcare workers, hospital administrators","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health departments"}]}
